socklog-remote.enable: set -e; rm -f config; touch config; for i in *.* s1000 N6 t5; do echo $i >> config; done; echo '!tryto -pv -k 10 -n 10 nc -q0 $(basename $(pwd)) 12000' >> config; mkdir -vp /var/log/socklog/main/toremote/192.168.59.3 && mv config /var/log/socklog/main/toremote/192.168.59.3/; pidof svlogd && kill -HUP $(pidof svlogd) || return 0;
socklog-remote.finish: rm -rf /var/log/socklog/main/toremote/; pidof svlogd && kill -HUP $(pidof svlogd) || return 0
